pyrex.generation.ShadowGenerator.get_particle_type¶

ShadowGenerator.get_particle_type()¶

Get the particle type of the next particle to be generated.

Randomly generates a neutrino flavor according to the flavor ratio of the generator, and chooses neutrino or antineutrino based on an assumption that the neutrinos are generated from proton-gamma interactions.

Returns:

Particle.Type

Enum value for the type of the particle.

See also

pyrex.Particle
Class for storing particle attributes.

Notes

The neutrino/antineutrino choice is based on Section 3 of [R4141].

References

[R4141](1, 2) A. Bhattacharya et al, “The Glashow resonance at IceCube.” JCAP 1110, 017 (2011).

PyREx

A Python package for simulation of neutrinos and radio antennas in ice. Version 1.7.0
